item.title: 中国电动汽车电池制造商 CATL 推出续航里程达 1,000 公里的 LFP 电池
item.description: 中国电动汽车（EV）电池制造商 CATL 周四发布了一款磷酸铁锂（LFP）电池，单次充电行驶里程超过 1000 公里（621 英里）。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle (EV) battery maker CATL on Thursday unveiled a lithium iron phosphate (LFP) battery with a driving range of more than 1,000 kilometres (621 miles) on a single charge.】

item.title: Meta 在法兰克福的股价因人工智能支出和收入预测而暴跌 16
item.description: Meta Platforms 周四早盘在法兰克福股价暴跌 16%，原因是公司预计支出增加，收入低于预期，令投资者失望。【原文：Meta Platforms shares plunged 16% early in Frankfurt on Thursday after forecasts of higher expenses and lighter revenue than expected disappointed investors.】

item.title: 联合利华季度销售增长超出预期
item.description: 联合利华（Unilever）在周四发布的最新交易报告中称，该公司第一季度基本销售额增长了 4.4%，好于预期。【原文：Unilever's underlying first-quarter sales grew by a better than expected 4.4%, it said in a trading update on Thursday, as one of the world's biggest consumer goods companies won back consumers who had traded down to cheaper products.】

item.title: LSEG 报告第一季度增长符合计划
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团周四表示，其第一季度的增长符合计划，与微软合作的产品将于 2024 年上半年推出。【原文：The London Stock Exchange Group said on Thursday its first quarter growth was in line with plans, and products from its partnership with Microsoft were due to be rolled out in the first half of 2024.】

item.title: 广告集团 WPP 公布第一季度内生增长下降 1.6
item.description: 英国广告集团 WPP 受医疗保健客户业务流失和科技公司支出减少的影响，第一季度有机增长率下降了 1.6%，落后于主要竞争对手。【原文：British ad group WPP reported a 1.6% drop in organic growth in the first quarter, lagging its major rivals, after it was hit by loss of business from a healthcare client and reduced spending by technology companies.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行第一季度利润下降 12
item.description: 巴克莱银行周四报告称，其第一季度利润下降了 12%，这表明该公司在实施十年来首次战略改革时将面临重重困难。【原文：Barclays reported its first quarter profit fell 12% on Thursday, as it showed early signs of the difficulties it will face in delivering on its first strategic revamp in a decade.】

item.title: 阿斯利康收入和利润超出预期，原因是需求强劲
item.description: 阿斯利康公司周四公布的季度收入和利润均高于市场预期，这主要得益于其肿瘤学和罕见血液病药物需求的恢复，以及合作药物收入的稳步增长。【原文：AstraZeneca reported quarterly revenue and profit above market estimates on Thursday, buoyed by resilient demand for its oncology and rare blood disorder drugs and steady growth in revenue from partnered medicines.】

item.title: 爱马仕第一季度销售额猛增 17%，各地区均有增长
item.description: Birkin包制造商爱马仕（Hermes）周四公布的第一季度销售额增长了17%，保持了上一季度的快速增长，凸显了市场对高端奢侈品的强劲需求。【原文：Birkin bag maker Hermes reported a 17% surge in first-quarter sales on Thursday, sustaining a rapid growth rate from the previous quarter and underlining strong demand for high end luxury.】

item.title: 阿托斯称集团需要比预期更多的现金
item.description: 陷入困境的法国IT咨询公司阿托斯（Atos）周四表示，对其2024-2027年业务计划的审查将导致对现金的需求增加，并有可能进一步削减债务，这迫使该公司在未来几天内更新其再融资计划的参数。【原文：Struggling French IT consulting firm Atos on Thursday said a review of its 2024-2027 business plan would lead to an increased need for cash and potentially additional debt reduction, forcing it to update the parameters of its refinancing plan in the coming days.】

item.title: 仿制药竞争和外汇影响导致赛诺菲第一季度利润下滑
item.description: 赛诺菲公司周四表示，第一季度营业收入下降了14.7%，原因是不利的汇率影响和多发性硬化症药物Aubagio的低价竞争超过了抗炎药物Dupixent的销售增长。【原文：Sanofi's said on Thursday first-quarter operating income declined 14.7% as unfavourable currency effects and cheap competition to multiple sclerosis drug Aubagio outweighed rising sales of anti-inflammatory drug Dupixent.】

item.title: 受汽车需求放缓影响，意法半导体下调财年收入预期
item.description: 欧洲芯片制造商意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics）周四下调了全年销售指导，这是最近一家因汽车制造商需求疲软以及笔记本电脑和手机公司订单进一步减少而陷入困境的半导体公司。【原文：European chipmaker STMicroelectronics on Thursday lowered its full-year sales guidance, the latest semiconductor company to struggle with weakening demand from carmakers and a further decline in orders from laptop and phone companies.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行利润超预期，得益于成本降低和全球银行业务发展
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas）周四公布第一季度利润和收入下降，但好于分析师预期，原因是支出减少和企业银行业务的强劲表现抵消了其他业务收入的持平或下降。【原文：BNP Paribas reported a fall in first-quarter profit and revenue on Thursday but beat analyst forecasts, as lower expenses and a strong performance in its corporate banking business offset flat or falling revenues elsewhere.】

item.title: 加拿大泰克资源公司第一季度利润不及预期
item.description: 加拿大矿商泰克资源公司（Teck Resources）周四公布的第一季度利润未达预期，部分原因是炼钢煤销量下降。【原文：Canadian miner Teck Resources missed first-quarter profit estimates on Thursday, partly due to lower steelmaking coal sales volumes.】

item.title: 雀巢公司季度销售额低于预期
item.description: 雀巢公司周四公布的第一季度有机销售额增长低于预期，原因是这家全球最大的包装食品公司提高了价格并减少了产品销量。【原文：Nestle on Thursday missed first-quarter organic sales growth estimates as the world's biggest packaged food company hiked prices and sold fewer products.】

item.title: 现代汽车第一季度利润下降 2.4%，超出预期
item.description: 韩国现代汽车公司（Hyundai Motor Co）周四公布的第一季度利润下降了 2.4%，超过了分析师的预期，这主要得益于高利润汽车的稳健销售，同时较低的国内货币汇率也促进了利润的回流。【原文：South Korea's Hyundai Motor Co reported on Thursday a drop of 2.4% in first-quarter profit, beating analysts forecasts, helped by solid sales of high-margin cars, while a cheaper domestic currency boosted repatriated earnings.】

item.title: 德意志银行第一季度净利润增长 10%，好于预期
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）周四公布，第一季度利润增长 10%，好于预期，原因是固定收益交易和交易的复苏推动了投资银行的收入增长。【原文：Deutsche Bank posted on Thursday a better-than-expected 10% rise in first-quarter profit as a resurgence in fixed-income trading and deal-making propelled revenue at the investment bank.】

item.title: Equinor 第一季度利润超预期
item.description: Equinor 周四公布的第一季度利润高于预期，并表示这主要得益于挪威本土的高产量和强劲的运营表现。【原文：Equinor on Thursday posted higher-than-expected profits for the first quarter and said this was driven by high production in its native Norway and strong operational performance.】

item.title: 淡季需求下降，LG Display 季度业绩重现亏损
item.description: 受电视用大型显示面板和智能手机用小型面板需求减弱的影响，韩国平板显示屏制造商 LG Display 第一季度再次出现运营亏损。【原文：South Korean flat-screen maker LG Display returned to an operating loss in the first quarter, hit by weakening demand for large display panels for TVs and small panels for smartphones.】

item.title: 据《中日本经济新闻》报道，丰田将推迟至 2026 年在美国投产电动汽车
item.description: 中日本经济新闻》周四称，丰田汽车公司将把在美国开始生产电动汽车（EV）的时间从拟议的2025年推迟到2026年春季。【原文：Toyota Motor will delay the start of its electric vehicle (EV) production in the U.S. to the spring of 2026 from the proposed 2025 timing, the Mid Japan Economist newspaper said on Thursday.】

item.title: 丰田表示将在中国与腾讯合作
item.description: 丰田汽车周四表示，将在中国与科技巨头腾讯合作，以扩大其在竞争激烈的汽车市场中的地位。【原文：Toyota Motor will partner with tech giant Tencent in China, it said on Thursday, as it looks to expand its position in the competitive auto market.】

item.title: 早间竞标为技术过山车之旅做好准备
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 必和必拓竞购盎格鲁，重塑铜业市场格局
item.description: 伦敦上市矿商英美资源集团（Anglo American）周四称，已收到必和必拓集团（BHP Group）的全股收购提议，该交易将使这家全球最大的上市矿商成为全球最大的铜生产商。【原文：London-listed miner Anglo American said on Thursday it had received an all-share buyout proposal from BHP Group , a deal that would make the world's biggest listed miner also the largest producer of copper globally.】

item.title: 巴斯夫第一季度盈利略有下降，但超出预期
item.description: 德国巴斯夫公司（BASF）称，第一季度调整后盈利同比下降 5.3%，主要原因是奖金拨备增加，但仍高于分析师的预期。【原文：Germany's BASF said first-quarter adjusted earnings fell 5.3% year on year, primarily due to higher bonus provisions, but still came in above analysts' consensus.】

item.title: 丰田公司 2023/24 财年产销量创历史新高
item.description: 丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor）周四表示，在截至 3 月 31 日的一年中，该公司的全球销售量和生产量均创下历史新高，这主要得益于各地区强劲的需求，以及该公司近年来一直面临的半导体供应紧张问题。【原文：Toyota Motor said on Thursday its global sales and production hit record highs in the year ended March 31, thanks to robust demand in each region and the lack of semiconductor supply constraints it had to endure in recent years.】

item.title: 彭博社称，印尼 Axiata 和 Sinar Mas 更接近于以 35 亿美元的价格进行电信合并
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）援引知情人士的话报道称，马来西亚企业集团 Axiata 集团和印尼 PT Sinar Mas 集团正在推进合并其在印尼电信业务的计划，以创建一个价值 35 亿美元的实体。【原文：Malaysian conglomerate Axiata Group and Indonesian group PT Sinar Mas are going ahead with plans to merge their telecom operations in Indonesia to create a $3.5 billion entity, Bloomberg News reported, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英美资源集团、必和必拓在世界各地的采矿业务
item.description: 英国跨国矿商英美资源集团（Anglo American）周四称，该公司已收到全球最大上市矿商必和必拓集团（BHP Group）的全股收购提议。【原文：British multinational miner Anglo American on Thursday said it had received an all-share takeover proposal from the world's largest listed miner, BHP Group .】

item.title: 数据显示：苹果失去中国市场头把交椅，第一季度出货量下降 6.6
item.description: 研究公司 IDC 周四发布的初步数据显示，在激烈的竞争中，苹果公司 2024 年第一季度智能手机出货量同比下降 6.6%，失去了中国最大智能手机销售商的桂冠。【原文：Apple lost its crown as China's biggest smartphone seller in the first quarter of 2024 as its smartphone shipments fell 6.6% from a year ago amid intense competition, preliminary data from research firm IDC showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯-奔驰将在中国市场推出豪华电动厢式车
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰公司货车部门负责人告诉德国《经济周刊》（WirtschaftsWoche），梅赛德斯-奔驰正计划基于其VAN.EA平台为中国市场推出一款豪华电动货车。【原文：Mercedes-Benz is planning to launch a luxury electric van for the Chinese market based on its VAN.EA platform, the head of the carmaker's vans division told German magazine WirtschaftsWoche.】

item.title: 预计美国第一季度经济增长缓慢但稳健；通胀可能升温
item.description: 第一季度，美国经济增长可能放缓，但步伐依然稳健，同时通胀加速，这强化了金融市场对美联储将推迟至 9 月降息的预期。【原文：U.S. economic growth likely slowed to a still-solid pace in the first quarter while inflation accelerated, reinforcing financial market expectations that the Federal Reserve would delay cutting interest rates until September.】

item.title: XPeng 首席执行官称其软件和人工智能升级将进入 "超快周期
item.description: 中国电动汽车（EV）制造商新鹏周四表示，其软件和人工智能培训升级将从5月起进入 "超快周期"，并希望其平台的使用范围扩大到亚洲其他国家和欧洲。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle (EV) maker XPeng on Thursday said its software and artificial intelligence training upgrades will enter a "super fast cycle" from May, and that it hopes use of its platform will expand to other Asian countries and Europe.】
